components: SERVICE BRAKES, HYDRAULIC,ENGINE AND ENGINE COOLING
summary: NAR 06/19/2003.  *MR  THE CONSUMERS VEHICLE WAS RECENTLY IN A NEAR COLLISION WHICH REQUIRED EMERGENCY BRAKE APPLICATION, AS A RESULT OF THE EMERGENCY BRAKING, THE BRAKE SYSTEM NO LONGER FUNCTIONED PROPERLY AND THE ENGINE IDLE HAD BECOME VERY ROUGH.  *CB  *JB
